item.title: [OpenAI Assistant](h
item.description: [OpenAI Assistant](https://platform.openai.com/docs/assistants/how-it-works/agents) integration is now available [under the input](https://docs.xenioo.com/actions-and-operations/input/openai) section.

item.title: [Distribution Lists]
item.description: [Distribution Lists](https://docs.xenioo.com/broadcast/distribution-lists) can now be scheduled to be executed at a specific date and time.
